mods:mods.note: B&w aerial photograph of Birtle Manitoba is situated above a block of text

BIRTLE MANITOBA CANADA IS SITUATED 200 MILES NORTHWEST OF THE CITY OF WINNIPEG. IT IS IN THE HEART OF THE BEST FARMING DISTRICT IN NOTH-WESTERN MANITOBA. THE WORLDS PRIZES FOR WHEAT OATS AND RYE WERE WON BY THIS DISTRICT. THE TOWN ITSELF IS SITUATED IN THE PICTURESQUE VALLEY OF THE BIRDTAIL RIVER. THIS STREAM IS CAPABLE OF PRODUCING CONSIDERABLE WATER-POWER. AUTOISTS AND TOURISTS ARE INVITED TO MAKE THIS A STOPPING PLACE. SEVERAL BEAUTIFUL SPOTS ARE AVAILABLE TO CAMPERS. THE FAMOUS BIRTLE SPRING WILL SUPPLY ALL THE LIQUID REFRESHMENTS REQUIRED. APPLY- A.E.QUELCH SECY. OR J.W. PRATT MAYOR.
